examples: Joe Biden also had a role model: Irish, Catholic, good-looking.

examples: The chef sprinkled a generous amount of roe on the dish.
The full English breakfast included a generous portion of black pudding alongside eggs, bacon, and beans.
He poured a generous amount of treacle over his warm pancakes
They sprinkled a generous amount of caraway seeds over their roasted vegetables.
He spread a generous amount of tartar sauce on his fish sandwich.
words.defineEn: showing a willingness or willing to freely give money, spend time, etc. with others
words.defineVi: thể hiện sự sẵn lòng hoặc sẵn sàng tự do cho tiền, dành thời gian, v.v. với người khác

examples: She’s always so cheerful.
He has designed a collection of cheap and cheerful sportswear.
It’s not the best place you’ll ever eat at, but it’s cheap and cheerful.
There's a restaurant round the corner that serves cheap and cheerful food.

When reaching out to a friend who is going through a difficult time, it's important to be mindful of their emotional state and avoid being overly cheerful or upbeat, as the saying goes, bring not a bagpipe to a man in trouble.
words.defineEn: feeling happy and positive or behaving in a way that shows this
words.defineVi: cảm thấy hạnh phúc và tích cực hoặc cư xử theo cách thể hiện điều này

words.defineEn: calm and not easily worried or annoyed
words.defineVi: bình tĩnh và không dễ dàng lo lắng hay khó chịu

examples: I've noticed that ever since he came into some money, Joe has become more talkative and confident.
So watch out for those talkative tummies.
He's not too talkative.
Flight of ideas, being more talkative.
Number three, you are more talkative than usual or feel internal pressure to keep talking.
words.defineEn: talking a great deal
words.defineVi: nói nhiều

examples: 'Yours is far too untidy!
'I'm untidy and careless and I forget the rules.
Tomorrow, all day, you will wear a notice on your forehead saying UNTIDY!'
words.defineEn: not properly organized or cared for
words.defineVi: không được tổ chức hoặc chăm sóc đúng cách

examples: The fashion designer's latest collection was ridiculed by some critics, but the designer remained optimistic - after all, there is no such thing as bad publicity.
They're so wise for their years, yet optimistic about the future!
Despite the challenges, the team remained optimistic and focused on finding achievable solutions.
He remained optimistic and confident despite facing multiple rejections from publishers, trusting that good things come to those who wait.
And Dexter tried to calm his faint resentment against her for casting a shadow over his optimistic mood.
words.defineEn: having or showing hope or a positive view of the future and always expecting good things to happen
words.defineVi: có hoặc thể hiện hy vọng hoặc một cái nhìn tích cực về tương lai và luôn mong đợi những điều tốt đẹp sẽ xảy ra

examples: The bill was four votes shy of a majority.
She was one week shy of her 13th birthday.
They scored just shy of 100 goals last year.
MacMillan has never fought shy of controversy.
The Democrats are three votes shy of a majority.
words.defineEn: nervous and uncomfortable around other people
words.defineVi: lo lắng và không thoải mái xung quanh người khác

examples: Kix is more reserved and will eventually follow her mother’s lead and give the new things a chance.
I do see Finns are very reserved, is that true, you think?
I'm a very sort of reserved and shy person.
Those close-in waters were reserved to protect a handful of local Small-Boat Fishermen, called Alia Fishermen, from competition from larger BOATS.
He was cautioning him to be more careful and more reserved.
words.defineEn: reluctant to share feelings or problems
words.defineVi: miễn cưỡng chia sẻ cảm xúc hoặc vấn đề

examples: As time went on he grew more and more impatient.
She turned to serve the impatient customer.
The impatient commuter elbowed through the crowded train station to catch the departing train.
I'm impatient.
Simone: I'm impatient.
words.defineEn: annoyed easily and quickly and unable to wait for a long time
words.defineVi: khó chịu một cách dễ dàng và nhanh chóng và không thể chờ đợi trong một thời gian dài

examples: The sociable student made it a point to meet all 144 of her classmates.
Furthermore, these sociable robots must be able to make appropriate facial expressions.
'I miss being sociable.'
Sociable weaver birds don’t build little nests between a couple of branches like your average bird does.
Kids with positive self-images are more happy, confident, independent, and sociable.
words.defineEn: possessing a friendly personality and be fond of spending time with people
words.defineVi: sở hữu một tính cách thân thiện và thích dành thời gian với mọi người

examples: She became more ambitious as the years passed.
The company's ambitious expansion plans went up in flames when their major investor pulled out.
The startup company is reaching for the moon with its ambitious goals to revolutionize the industry.
The ambitious entrepreneur took a risk and started his own business, knowing that it was better to live one day as a tiger than a thousand years as a sheep working for someone else.
The ambitious student knew that he had to take challenging courses to achieve his dream of attending a top university.
words.defineEn: trying or wishing to gain great success, power, or wealth
words.defineVi: cố gắng hoặc mong muốn đạt được thành công lớn, quyền lực hoặc sự giàu có

examples: The pig's nose is sensitive and sniffes the air for food.
School reform is a sensitive issue, and many politicians treat it with kid gloves.
I need to find a gentle soap for sensitive skin.
I always advise my clients to be cautious about sharing sensitive information online.
Douglas held his tongue, preferring not to speak out on a politically sensitive issue.
words.defineEn: capable of understanding other people's emotions and caring for them
words.defineVi: có khả năng hiểu cảm xúc của người khác và quan tâm đến họ

words.defineEn: something that is cooked, created, or produced at home
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được nấu chín, tạo ra, hoặc sản xuất tại nhà
